items.title: Jeff Bezos’ most expensive investment is a $500 million custom superyacht that’s the largest in the world
items.description: The Amazon founder even paid an extra $75 million for another yacht to support his superyacht.

items.title: France to probe Elon Musk’s Grok after it said Holocaust gas chambers were used for ‘disinfection’ against ‘typhus’ rather than murder
items.description: Earlier this year, Musk’s company took down posts from the chatbot that appeared to praise Adolf Hitler after complaints about antisemitic content.

items.title: Nvidia CEO says AI will actually make everyone a lot busier: ‘Everybody’s jobs will be different’
items.description: “I would say that there's every evidence that we will be more productive and yet still be busier because we have so many ideas,” Jensen Huang said.

items.title: How Principal Financial’s new CEO brought AI religion to the C-suite, and then worked to upskill 20,000 employees
items.description: Principal Financial CEO Deanna Strable has made AI literacy a key focus across all levels of the company.

items.title: The stock market’s ‘fear gauge’ spiked to its highest level since Trump’s ‘Liberation Day’ tariffs caused a global selloff
items.description: Tech valuations, interest rates, and geopolitical risks are creating a "perfect storm" of uncertainty.
